app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Cizoo Sing Karaoke Auto tune
app_description: Do you enjoy singing and karaoke but don t always have access to a karaoke machine or a venue Look no further than Cizoo the innovative mobile app that offers a one of a kind singing experience! Cizoo offers a massive library of free songs that you can choose from making it easy to find your favorite tunes or discover new ones. Whether you prefer classic hits modern pop rock anthems or soulful ballads Cizoo has got you covered. You can sing solo or invite your friends to join you in duet mode where you can perform duets and harmonize with one another making for a truly immersive singing experience. One of the standout features of Cizoo is its audio effects. With Cizoo you don t need to worry about singing out of tune as the app s magic effects can help you sound like a pro. You can also record your performances and add high quality audio effects making your tracks sound polished and professional. Cizoo isn t just a karaoke app it s also a social network where you can build your fanbase and interact with other singers from all over the world. You can participate in challenges in story mode where you can showcase your singing skills and improve your techniques. Additionally you can use the messaging feature to connect with other singers and make new friends who share your passion for singing. Cizoo offers acappella mode allowing you to sing without music making it perfect for those times when you want to work on your vocals or practice your harmonies. The app also comes with awesome video filters that you can use to create stunning music videos to share on your social media profiles or with your friends. Get more: Magic effects to make you sing in tune A music studio in your pocket with qualitative audio effects Duet mode Social network to build your fanbase and gather with friends Millions of songs available A cappella mode to sing without music Awesome video filters to create best singing videos Messaging Story mode to improve your singing thanks to challenges Blindtest to test your music knowledge and challenge your friends Privacy Policy: https: www.cizoo.io privacy Terms of Service: https: www.cizoo.io tos In App Purchase information: Subscribe to the Cizoo VIP Pack for only 6.49 per week amount in USD in US App Store .
